# theta (arcmin), kSZ (muK*sqarcmin), tSZ (muK*sqarcmin) 
#  These are GNFW projections with Battaglia parameters for M=1e13, z=0.55 
#  NOTE we decided to fix alpha for kSZ = 0.88 and xc for tSZ = 0.497 (taking out the m and z dependence) 
#  theta_rho=[np.log10(rho0),bt,a2h]= [3.1864410705359125, 3.45493977635, 1.0] 
#  theta_pth=[P0,bt,a2h]=[9.10766709141, 4.76625102519, 1.0] 
#  Projections calculated by FFT, rad = (-3,1), 2h file = twohalo_cmass_average, Cosmology: omegam = 0.25 
#  Resolution factor (2 for kSZ, 3.5 for tSZ) 
#  Projection constants for kSZ correct 
1.000000000000000000e+00 6.010366057446250299e-01 -5.617476503762215412e-01
